name: Amjid Ali
bio:
I specialise in transforming enterprises into AI-driven, insight-powered ecosystems by combining Agentic AI, Business Intelligence, and workflow automation to unlock performance, efficiency, and strategic growth.

Key Expertise:
– Agentic AI Systems & Autonomous Agents
– Workflow & Business Process Automation (n8n, low-code)
– RAG Pipelines & LLM Integrations
– Business Intelligence (Power BI, Azure)
– Financial Reporting & Performance Analytics
– AI Governance, Data Strategy & Responsible AI
